author: mfojtik
msg: Added Image creation from Instances (EC2, Mock, GoGrid, Rackspace)

author: sascharodekamp
msg: Improvement - ProductContentWrapper didn't return ProductContent for virtual products (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4204).
When the method checks if "ProductContent" exists, it did not differ bedween variant and other products.
So if the ProductContent is empty for variant products, it did not check if the parentProduct has ProductContent of this type that could be returned.
This Patch improves the ProductContentWrapper to check variant products parent for ProductContent if thier content is empty.

author: gsim
msg: QPID-3120: Consult alternate exchange on reroute if needed

author: rjung
msg: NSAPI: Use lower case header names for responses.
Otherwise the web server might add chunked transfer encoding header
in addition to our content length header.
Problem reported on dev list by Jon Forster.

author: mtylenda
msg: OPENJPA-1376: Documentation update - add migration section on allocationSize property of @SequenceGenerator.
